attributes.action: Pigeon Fanciers Against Wild Birds Of Prey
attributes.additional_details: To address the Bird Of Prey issues, lmit the amount of BOPS being introduced into the UK. Limit the breeding programme of perigrine falcons. Help Save the sport of Pigeon Racing in the UK. Look at the issues concerning the pigeon fancier and their losses of racing pigeons caused by Perigrine Falcons.
